short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple widget displaying the top 15 cryptocurrency prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Prices Widget for Chrome

Stay up to date with the top 15 cryptocurrencies! This minimalistic Chrome extension provides real-time prices, market capitalization, and 24-hour price changes for the leading cryptocurrencies. 

Instantly check cryptocurrency prices right from your browser bar with this lightweight Chrome extension. Get real-time rates for major cryptocurrencies from Bitcoin to TON without opening any websites, helping you stay informed while avoiding distractions.

Easily accessible in your browser's popup or as a dedicated new tab, Crypto Prices Widget keeps you informed with a sleek and simple interface. Perfect for crypto enthusiasts and traders who want to track market movements with ease.

Monitor prices of the major coins including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Toncoin and more.

Version 1.1. Minor improvements and bug fixes implemented.
